Player History
Injured on 5/12/1966 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/1968...
Drafted in 6th round, 118th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1969...
Injured on 7/11/1973 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/12/1978...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/6/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $4,250,000 per year...
Injured on 4/3/1985 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/10/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $1,350,000 per year...
